Account Recovery: Instance Record
column4: Description

Account Recovery: BQ Planning Instance Record
BQ Planning Instance Record
column4: Recovery tasks and targets added to the Account Recovery Case Resolution Schedule

Account Recovery: BQ Planning Instance Record
column3: Account Recovery Case Planning Task Record
column4: Processing record for the planning task within the account recovery process

Account Recovery: BQ Negotiation Instance Record
BQ Negotiation Instance Record
column4: Defines bank's policies and guidelines for account recovery/write down handling

Account Recovery: BQ Negotiation Instance Record
column4: Reference to negotiation/confirmation messages sent to involved parties, includes internal and external legal/law enforcement authorities

Account Recovery: BQ Negotiation Instance Record
column4: Copies of correspondence content as appropriate

Account Recovery: BQ Negotiation Instance Record
column4: Reference to legal documents created & referenced during the account recovery negotiation process

Account Recovery: BQ Negotiation Instance Record
column4: Copies of document copy/content as appropriate

Account Recovery: BQ Negotiation Instance Record
column3: Account Recovery Case Negotiation Task Record
column4: Processing record for the negotiation task within the account recovery process

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: This is the type of recovery case (e.g. lapsed payment, collateral revaluation, credit)

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Refers to the product instance associated with the account recovery case

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Refers to any new/replacement product established during the recovery/restructuring process

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Reference to the customer associated with account recovery case - likely product 'owner'

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: The assigned customer relationship manager or unit for the case

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Reference to the underlying account for the product instance being recovered

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Location where the business is booked for reporting purposes

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Key dates associated with recovery (e.g. account open, account closing)

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Key date time vale

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Reference to involved and interested parties (e.g. guarantor/cosigner)

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Details the involved party's role/association with the account/account holder

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: The type of account being recovered (e.g. checking, mortgage)

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: The currency for the account

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Limits that are applied to the account  (e.g. transaction credit/debit, netting, position)

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Current position against limits

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Any additional parties given access to the account  (allowed roles and actions against the product)

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Reference to a tax identifier associated with the customer/account for tax reporting

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Status of the recovery account  (e.g. pre-opened, active, dormant, pending for closing, blocked)

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Lists the customer's collateral asset allocation status against different loan products known to the bank

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: The type of asset (e.g. building, machinery, inventory, financial instrument, art)

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Description of significant details and properties of the asset

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Details of all transactions made against the account - not itemized here but referenced from fulfillment processing

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Work documentation, forms and schedules produced and referenced during the case

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Reference to documents referenced and generated through the case

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Record of customer correspondence/feedback associated with the account recovery process

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: Target and actual dates for processing/resolution

Account Recovery: CR Account Recovery Procedure Instance Record
column4: The status of the recovery case (e.g. in assessment, write-down, planning, negotiation, restructuring)

BQ Writedown Instance Record
column4: Booking to the appropriate asset/liability account required to reflect anticipated loss

column3: Account Recovery Case Write-down Task Record
column4: Processing record for the write-down task within the account recovery process

Account Recovery: BQ Assessment Instance Record
BQ Assessment Instance Record
column3: Account Recovery Case Assessment Task Record
column4: Processing record for the assessment task within the account recovery process

BQ Restructuring Instance Record
column4: Target dates for account restructuring/set-up added to the Account Recovery Case Resolution Schedule
